name: Flower Girl
description:
Your are the chosen flower girl of the Princesses's wedding! Unfortuntately, you lost your flowers on the way to her wedding! In order to get to the wedding time, you must go through the Enchanted Forest and collect flowers for the wedding! However, look out for the spikes and flowers that are looking to eat you!

Now go get to the wedding on time!

Instructions:

Just click anywhere on the screen other than the pause button to jump!
